name: No Name Mountain
description:
This is my first attempt at making a "proper" game. (Made for a game jam).

You are a little circle who is attempting to hike their way to the top of No Name Mountain. Jump and shoot your way through the mountains strange cave.

How to Play:
WASD to Move
Press Space to Jump (Hold to Jump higher)
Point and Click to Shoot
There are "Hidden" Coins in every level which give bonus score. Does score do anything? No...Unless you like to see higher numbers.

Credits:
Created by
ImMrReject

Music
Alone by Sudocolon at https://opengameart.org/content/alone
Cave Theme by Brandon75689 (HaelDB) at https://opengameart.org/content/cave-theme
Boss Battle #2 [8-BIT RE-UPLOAD] by nene at https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-2-8-bit-re-upload
